title: Jam 2021: “Handle with Care”
short_description: Are you a college or university student who would like to hear from museum staff who work directly with objects in the museum’s collection?
header_description: Hear from museum staff who work directly with objects in the museum’s collection.
list_description: Are you a college or university student who would like to hear from museum staff who work directly with objects in the museum’s collection?
description:
Featured speakers:

Aidan Fitzpatrick, Associate Director, Photography
Leslie Carlson, Director, Art Preparation and Logistics
Thomas Huston, Technician, Architecture and Design | Modern and Contemporary Art

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students; registration required
